DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, randomized study will compare the efficacy, safety, and acceptability of mifepristone 200 mg followed in 24-36 hours either by buccal (i.e., in the cheeks) or oral misoprostol 800 mcg for termination of pregnancy in women up to 63 days L.M.P.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial of Buccal Compared to Oral Misoprostol Following Mifepristone for Medical Abortion up to 63 Days LMP
